Start.text:
You see a blinding pure yellow light and suddenly all goes dark..
After a few second your eyes seem to adapt and you see five figures..
A charming snow white wolf human hybrid, around 2 meters tall and seemingly strong, wearing a paladins armor of sorts.
A small feminine almost child like short cat boy with long lush white snow white hair with some light blue streaks in it.
A large spider girl of sorts with-...

SnowTownCollegeDormStart.text: You wake up in the morning white streaks of hair on your face, your vision blurred and your body tired.
options: Rub your eyes and sit up

SnowTownCollegeDormBedroomStart.text: You sit up and your vision gets obscured as more lush white hair slides onto your face.
options: Slide your hair out of your face and look around

SnowTownCollegeDormBedroomLookfromBed.text:
As you look around you see your bed, it has a almost royal looking frame and the cover has mostly pink artwork on it.
A nightstand stands next to your bed
There also posters on your walls with pink wallpaper. The pink tinted window makes the fact you like pink even more obvious (If it is even you..)
